extendedInfo.description: *** "Every good mobile operating system needs a solid flight simulation app, and Android has found that in Stealth Chopper 3D" - Android Central ***Take Command of a Modified Black Hawk Stealth Combat Helicopter in this action packed Flight Simulator!Fly SEAL TEAM SIX in 4 unique environments. Fight off enemy tanks, guns, and aircraft with you arsenal of weapons. Use your chopper on various missions including attack, assault, and reconnaissance (bonus level to kill Osama included). Stealth Aircraft are essential for conducting Modern Warfare. You must be able to fly at high speeds, low altitude, and on short notice. Only the best pilots need apply. Do you have what it takes?How To Play:Use the TouchScreen to Control Throttle,Missiles,and Guns.Use the TouchScreen to switch between Air-to-Air and Air-to-Ground Modes.Use the Accelerometers to control Pitch and Roll.****WAYPOINT IS THE BLUE MARKER ON COMPASS***********CENTER BLUE MARKER ON THE BOTTOM OF THE COMPASS********visit us on https://sites.google.com/site/flexfridaysoftFEATURES:* Full 3D graphics using opengl at 60 FPS on Duel Core Devices. * Realistic flight physics.* 3D volumetric smoke and explosions. * Multiple terrain types with varied mission. * Designed from the ground up for Android Tablets and Phones.* Android exclusive* Ad Free* No Special Permissions* No external resources to download* Intiutive Flight Sim ControlsRequirements:1 Ghz processor (Duel Core Tegra 2 recommended)512 Mb of Ram (1 Gb recommended)Opengl ES 1.1 support.Requires accelerometer.

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy tab 10.1 i calibrated it laying down, but forward or backwards...no matter which, only lets my copter go back...please please fix this and make the gun control a little better and will def give 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where is the blue diamond waypoint?
reviews.comment: I\'ve flown until out of fuel in every direction looking for the first waypoint. As with at least one other reviewer here, it seems not to exist. It\'s past the 15 minute trial/refund period so no refund. I guess I keep it and pray whatever the problem it\'s soon fixed. (Even 1 star is too high a rating for an immediate FAIL.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bonus level
reviews.comment: On the bonus stage, it says fly low to avoid enemy radar, but I can only find the compound after being targeted by the enemy. Want a refund. Or an update.
reviews.author: Dwan Bowens

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I got the demo first ... to check it out .... it w as cool so I bought it ... lol (;  just wish you can have different views when flying. ...
reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

reviews.title: I\'ve tried them all...
reviews.comment: Though this is a game, not a simulator, I think it is the best available. With limited input capabilities, Android systems are not ideal for flight simulators. I am giving only 4 stars because the targeting marks are hard to see. I\'ve asked the developer to correct this, and if so, I will change my rating to 5 stars. The developer made the marks easier to see, so I am now rating it 5 stars like I said. Still wish they were a little brighter, though. Calibrate it in the position you hold to play, never flat.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game, but can\'t seem to complete the first mission.
Great little game on Galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: Great way to kill time.  On other reviews.  <You can\'t calibrate laying flat.>< Rotate until blue Diamond is at the bottom of the compass and head that way.> finished the game,  Need more levels.
reviews.author: Tom Booth

reviews.comment: Excellent controls if calibrated. Fun game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice time killer
reviews.comment: Reminds me a little of Microprose\'s Gunship on my Commodore 64, but with a lot better graphics. I miss that game. Once you get used to the controls in this one, it starts to suck you into the missions. More of a cockpit view and radar might be nice, but overall a good buy.
reviews.author: Lawrence Katz

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: Very good game worth more than 2 dollars. Have paid more for games that are not near as good.
reviews.author: Roger Archambeault

reviews.title: AWESOME FREAKING GAME!!!!
reviews.comment: MOST FUN GAME ON GOOGLE PLAY....HANDS DOWN!!!!  YOU WON\'T REGRET TRYING THIS ONE!!!!  MUST HAVE IF YOU CALL YOURSELF AN \"ANDROIDER\"!!!!!!!!!!  AND DON\'T LISTEN TO THE \"IDIOTS\" THAT CAN\'T FIGURE IT OUT!!!!  IT\'S A PIECE OF CAKE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Terry Billow

reviews.title: Stealth chopper
reviews.comment: This is a nice helicopter game. Not overly intense which some of us like instead of an overwhelming overburden fast pace game. I really like this.
reviews.author: Dave Charbonneau

reviews.title: Cool Game
reviews.comment: A more than excellent way to pass the time. With over 15 missions I, nor anyone else should get bored playing this game. It truly deserves a 5\\5, what an outstanding buy on the google play store.
reviews.author: James Le Baron

reviews.title: Waste of a game
reviews.comment: They couldn\'t even lock the menu screens so that they don\'t enlarge! The compare headings are barely viewable on nexus 7. Save your time and money for this loser!
reviews.author: Joseph Bolanos
